task.title: Applying Payment to Multiple Invoices
task.abstract: Users can pay multiple invoices through a single payment, saving both time and excess bank fees per transaction.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Invoice tab within the eBusiness application.
Select the box next to each invoice that requires payment. Click Apply Payment.
Select payment method and enter the required values. Select the Save checkbox to save payment information.
Click the Pay button to apply payment to the selected invoices.

taskbody.result: The associated Sales Order record for each invoice updates the ePayment and Receipt transaction history following the successful application of payment.
